concept.title: Payroll Processing
concept.shortdesc: Payrolls can be processed from the Payroll Overview page. The steps that appear on the Payroll Overview page depend on the payroll model associated with the selected pay group.

conbody.p: From the Payroll Overview page (Payroll Processing > Payroll Gateway > select pay group), you can complete the following:

ul.li: View the bank assigned to this pay group

View and process the payroll steps
From the Things I Can Do section, you can access the following information that appears on other pages:
View or edit payroll results/instant checks/cheques
View Employee Pay Transferred to Payroll
View Status of Direct Deposit Group Files
View Pending Pay Items Status History

conbody.p: Each payroll model completes four basic transaction workflow: Start payroll, Create and calculate payroll, View/edit payroll results, Finish payroll. Note that Open/Close payroll models only use the Start payroll and Finish payroll functions.
